name: Shooter (FransRiz)
description: The player only has to move the direction on the keyboard to avoid the NPC and left click on the mouse to shoot the NPC, but each NPC is different they have the Life written on the NPC for the lives of NPCs from 1 - ∞ depending on the level reached by the player, here every certain levels of players will get additional lives in order to reach the next level that NPCs will multiply and of course the lives of NPCs will also be a lot because this game has no end or games with endless, then if the player dies then what level and how many seconds player dies and after that the game will start from the beginning
